mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, board_no, board_category_no, user_no, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_original_filename, board_rename_filename, board_readcount from (select * from board order by board_no desc)) b left join user_info u on (b.user_no = u.user_no) left join board_category c on (b.board_category_no = c.board_category_no) where rnum between #{ startRow } and #{ endRow }
mapper.update: update board set board_readcount = board_readcount + 1 where board_no = #{ board_no }
mapper.select: select * from board where board_no = #{ board_no }
mapper.insert: insert into board values( (select max(board_no) + 1 from board), #{board_category_no}, #{user_no}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, sysdate, #{board_original_filename}, #{board_rename_filename}, default )
